#Optional: Drop Non-Defaults
defaults = pd.read_csv("/kaggle/input/food-lovers-global-cuisine-preferences-survey/Food_Lovers_Cuisine_Preferences/Default_Options.csv")
keep = ['Latitude', 'Longitude'] + list(defaults['Cuisines'])

foodPref = foodPref[keep]
foodAvail = foodAvail[keep]
source.00663eb9:
import plotly.express as px
import pandas as pd

target="Italian"

fig = px.scatter_geo(foodPref,lat='Latitude',lon='Longitude', color=target)
fig.update_layout(title = f'{target} Cuisine Preferred', title_x=0.5)
fig.show()

fig = px.scatter_geo(foodAvail,lat='Latitude',lon='Longitude', color=target)
fig.update_layout(title = f'{target} Cuisine Available', title_x=0.5)
fig.show()
source.155eba65:
fig = px.scatter_geo(foodPref,lat='Latitude',lon='Longitude',color_discrete_sequence=["red" for x in foodPref['Latitude']])
fig.update_layout(title = 'Map of Survey Participants', title_x=0.5)
fig.show()
fig.write_image('Map.png')
